snippet.title: Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place - A point-and-click horror experience inspired by The Twilight Zone!
snippet.description:
Purchase on itch.io https://octavinavarro.itch.io/midnight-scenes-a-safe-place?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Content Warning: Content not appropriate for all ages, including horror themes, gore, mental health, and suicide, which some players may find distressing. 

In tonight's episode of Midnight Scenes, Phil’s existence is threatened by his oppressive home environment, intransigent parents, and terrible nightmares that push his sanity close to the precipice.

In this dark tale exploring themes of isolation and loneliness, our protagonist confronts terrifying truths buried deep inside him. Will he survive the test?

Turn off the lights and enter the depths of Midnight Scenes: A Safe Place.

This is the fifth in a series of short horror tales with adventure elements by Octavi Navarro, creator of the critically acclaimed games The Supper, The Librarian, and Uninvited, and artist on Thimbleweed Park and Photographs.

➡️ More from Octavi Navarro https://octavinavarro.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
